alert.note: Alert for Crane; Pecos; Reeves; Ward (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 23 at 8:40PM CST until January 23 at 9:15PM CST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 PM CST FOR NORTH CENTRAL PECOS...EASTERN REEVES...SOUTHEASTERN WARD AND CRANE COUNTIES... At 840 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles west of Grandfalls to 26 miles southwest of Crane to 15 miles northeast of Fort Stockton, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Crane, Grandfalls, Royalty, Coyanosa, Imperial Reservoir, Crane County Airport, Imperial, Bakersfield, Girvin, and Cordona Lake. This includes Interstate 10 between mile markers 270 and 277, and between mile markers 283 and 297. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
